history.proof: intros a b Q H. inversion H as [H1 H2 H3 H4 H5]. srun best use: reduceplus_cb2.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, p, q.

ctx: inversion H as [H1 H2 H3 H4 H5].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H1, H2 : list (Term A n) H3 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H5 : H1 = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a H0 : H2 = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b Unable to unify "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b)" with "CombLinear (b :: Q) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a)".

ctx: inversion H as [H1 H2 H3 H4 H5].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H1, H2 : list (Term A n) H3 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H5 : H1 = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a H0 : H2 = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b Unable to unify "H1 = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a" with "CombLinear (b :: Q) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a)".
